name: Kunai (itch) (DeadPieGamer)
description:
Graphics used: https://finalgatestudios.itch.io/ninja-asset-pack & https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-slime

Controls:

  • Move left - A
  • Move right - D
  • Crouch/Fall through semisolids - S
  • Jump - Space / W
  • Throw Kunai - K
  • Attack - J
  • Confirm - E (Use when standing next to dummy to finish stages)
  • Move camera - Arrow Keys (Stand still while doing this)

Tip: Try throwing a kunai and then jumping while running

The game is in its very early states, so feedback and advice is appreciated

Known flaws

  • No crouch animation (currently same as falling)
  • Very short
  • Options menu doesn't work yet
  • Text looks weird
